channel.title: Server is offline (but i can log in)
channel.description:
hello... i have follow everystep on this post ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html ) and when i compile and then run my server comes online; when i try to log on via moparscape using my ip e-scape.no-ip.info i cannot log in... i tried logging in with 'localhost' and i can get in but no one else can. i tried adding my server to the serverlist on this site but it won't let me because its ofline... [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l248/bonneau_14/asdas.jpg[/img] i have no-ip running while i try to do this (it is on the taskbar) and i still can't get it going... i'm not sure if this is whats supposed to happen when i run the server so i just want to check. [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l248/bonneau_14/dhdhd.jpg[/img] i'll show you guys the router i'm using: [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l248/bonneau_14/xfhd.jpg[/img]
So? when i try to get the server running all i have to do is run the 'runserver.bat' file? becasue that allows me to log on but no one else. and where should i have my source file place?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2008, 03:07:52 PM[/size][hr]*bumb*
I would like to get an answer because i'm anxious to start my server and i do not want to make another thread in order to get my answer...
*sorry for bumping if its against the rules but i believe my reason will allow an exception*

item.title: Server is offline (but i can log in)
item.dc:creator: @Vossler Vossler
item.description:
@Vossler wrote:

hello… i have follow everystep on this post ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html ) and when i compile and then run my server comes online; when i try to log on via moparscape using my ip e-scape.no-ip.info i cannot log in… i tried logging in with ‘localhost’ and i can get in but no one else can. i tried adding my server to the serverlist on this site but it won’t let me because its ofline…

i have no-ip running while i try to do this (it is on the taskbar) and i still can’t get it going… i’m not sure if this is whats supposed to happen when i run the server so i just want to check.

i’ll show you guys the router i’m using:

So? when i try to get the server running all i have to do is run the ‘runserver.bat’ file? becasue that allows me to log on but no one else. and where should i have my source file place?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2008, 03:07:52 PM[/size][hr]bumb

I would like to get an answer because i’m anxious to start my server and i do not want to make another thread in order to get my answer…

sorry for bumping if its against the rules but i believe my reason will allow an exception
